 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכָה‎</span>, so most] **verb Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** as adjective in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּסִים מוּזָנִים מַשְׁכִּים הָיוּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.8|Jer 5:8]] usually, ***horses... roaming at large*** they have become (compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — but meaning lustful needed; [[BDB#Aq|Aq]] [[BDB#Theod|Theod]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἔλκοντες</span>, [[BDB#Jer|Jerome]] ***trahentes*** (that is, ***genitalia***), i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משְׁכִים‎</span>; read with Arnheim [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַאֲשָׁכִים‎</span>, i.e. fed ***stallions*** (literally ***growing*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשָׁכִים‎</span>, [[Lev.21.20|Lev 21:20]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְרִין‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַפְרִים‎</span>).
